DataElement.preferredName: Anti-Diarrhea Medication Past Seven Days Average Frequency Daily Taken 4 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how often on average they took daily anti-diarrhea medication over the past seven days, using a text term description of the frequency.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Antidiarrheal Agent Past Week Average How Often Daily Taken
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Miscellaneous agents found useful in the symptomatic treatment of diarrhea. They have no effect on the agent(s) that cause diarrhea, but merely alleviate the condition. (MeSH)_The most recent week, including today._A statistical calculation describing the central tendency of a set of numbers; used to interpret quantitative data._A question about the frequency of an event or behavior._Occurring or done each day._Having been accepted for some purpose; ingested as a medication.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Miscellaneous agents found useful in the symptomatic treatment of diarrhea. They have no effect on the agent(s) that cause diarrhea, but merely alleviate the condition. (MeSH)

Concepts.definition: A pharmacological agent that may ameliorate the symptoms of diarrhetic illnesses.

Property.preferredName: Past Week Average How Often Daily Taken
Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week, including today.:A statistical calculation describing the central tendency of a set of numbers; used to interpret quantitative data.:A question about the frequency of an event or behavior.:Occurring or done each day.:Having been accepted for some purpose; ingested as a medication.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.
A statistical calculation describing the central tendency of a set of numbers; used to interpret quantitative data.
A question about the frequency of an event or behavior.
Having been accepted for some purpose; ingested as a medication.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard with 4 responses related to the number of times per day.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Four times per day. (NCI): Six times per day.: The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.

Concepts.definition: The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.
